translation.en: Did you put a spell on us?
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちに魔法(まほう)を？

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: Because we want to quit ballet. It was awful.
translation.ja: だってバレエを やめたいんだもん

translation.en: I was awful. I thought it'd be fun, but everyone laughed.
translation.ja: うまく おどれなくて みんなに笑われた

translation.en: Honey.
translation.ja: アイビー

translation.en: You don't have to take ballet.
translation.ja: ムリしなくていい

translation.en: If it's not for you, just… just stop.
translation.ja: 向いてないなら やめなさい

translation.en: You're not mad?
translation.ja: 怒(おこ)らない？

translation.en: No, of course not.
translation.ja: 怒(おこ)るわけない

translation.en: I want you to explore things,
translation.ja: いろんなことを経験(けいけん)して

translation.en: so you can find out what you are and aren't passionate about.
translation.ja: 好きなことを見つけてほしい

translation.en: Hmm. You did discover something. You discovered that ballet wasn't for you.
translation.ja: バレエは向いてないと 分かったわね

translation.en: [giggles] Come here.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: Don't even think about it.
translation.ja: やめさせない

translation.en: Mom, you're so unfair. Ivy's mom let her quit.
translation.ja: アイビーのママは やめていいって

translation.en: Well, I'm not Ivy's mom. Moms are different just the way kids are different.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)はアイビーのママじゃない

translation.en: But I'm not different from Ivy. I also discovered ballet isn't for me, so how come I can't quit?
translation.ja: でも私(わたし)も バレエは 向いてないと分かったもん

translation.en: [Charlotte] Aside from the fact that you made a promise?
translation.ja: 約束したでしょ？

translation.en: Because I want you to learn how to stick with something, Bean.
translation.ja: やりぬく力をつけてほしいの

translation.en: Ballet is hard.
translation.ja: 難(むずか)しくても

translation.en: But if you work at it and persevere, you might discover you're good at it.
translation.ja: 努力すれば 向いてると思えるかも

translation.en: Or die of boredom. It happens, you know.
translation.ja: つまらなくて死んじゃう

translation.en: Or learn to like it.
translation.ja: 好きになりなさい

translation.en: Either way, I think you'll survive.
translation.ja: あなたならできるわ

translation.en: -[groans] -[Charlotte] You may even thank me.
translation.ja: 私に感謝(かんしゃ)する日が来るかも

translation.en: Come on. Now, go take a bath.
translation.ja: さあ おふろへ

translation.en: No, you made me take a bath yesterday.
translation.ja: イヤだ　昨日入ったもん

translation.en: [David] Bean, straight to bed. Lights out in ten minutes.
translation.ja: ビーン もう寝(ね)る時間だぞ

translation.en: -[radio static] -[Ivy] Wanda Rich reporting for duty. What's your 20, Grizzly Girl?
translation.ja: こちらアイビー 応答(おうとう)せよ

translation.en: -[Bean sighs] -[Ivy] Grizzly Girl? Are you there?
translation.ja: ビーン いる？

translation.en: Bean!
translation.ja: ビーン！

translation.en: -Bean? -[Bean] I'm here. In a not good mood.
translation.ja: いるよ　でも気分は最悪

translation.en: My life is ruined.
translation.ja: おしまいだよ

translation.en: She really won't let you quit?
translation.ja: 続けなさいと？

translation.en: [sighs] Nope. I even tried to cry. She just told me to stop drooling.
translation.ja: 泣いてみたけど 相手にされなかった

translation.en: This is bad.
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: If you have to do ballet, I think I have to do it too.
translation.ja: ビーンが続けるなら 私(わたし)もやるよ

translation.en: No, you don't.
translation.ja: やらなくていい

translation.en: I was the one who got you into this. It was all my idea.
translation.ja: バレエをやろうと言ったのは 私(わたし)だもん

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: What if you fall, like, a hundred times?
translation.ja: 100回 転んだらどうするの？

translation.en: I won't quit.
translation.ja: やめない

translation.en: What if you twirl so much your toes bleed in your ballet shoes
translation.ja: クルクル回って つま先から血が出て

translation.en: and get scabs that fall off and bleed even more?
translation.ja: かさぶたが はがれて もっと血が出たら？

translation.en: I still won't quit.
translation.ja: やめない

translation.en: [sighs] What if kids laugh at you?
translation.ja: また笑われたら？

translation.en: I'll have to endure.
translation.ja: 耐(た)えるしかない

translation.en: I guess we're doomed, Ivy.
translation.ja: やるしかないみたい

translation.en: You and me. Doomed to dance.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちは おどる運命なんだよ

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Group un.
translation.ja: グループ１

translation.en: Very good.
translation.ja: すばらしい

translation.en: Group deux.
translation.ja: グループ２

translation.en: Group trois.
translation.ja: グループ３

translation.en: Group Ivy and Bean.
translation.ja: アイビーとビーン

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Monsieur Joie] Oh, no. No, no, no.
translation.ja: そうじゃない

translation.en: -[grunting] -[Monsieur Joie] Oh, mademoiselles.
translation.ja: なんてことだ

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Lovely, Zuzu.
translation.ja: いいね ズズ

translation.en: -Remember, we are what? -[Bean grunting]
translation.ja: 今の君たちは⸺

translation.en: Gazelles!
translation.ja: ガゼルだ

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] All right, mes enfants. Settle down. Settle down.
translation.ja: 〈さあ 子どもたち〉 静かに

translation.en: -[banging] -Marvelous news.
translation.ja: いい知らせだ

translation.en: This year, for the first time, we are not doing a little recital here in the studio.
translation.ja: 今年の発表会は このスタジオでは行わない

translation.en: Instead, we are taking part in A Festival of Movement.
translation.ja: その代わりに ダンス大会に参加する

translation.en: A Dance Delirium in 26 Acts.
translation.ja: その名も “ダンス･デリリアム”

translation.en: Which is why I have chosen something très unique for this performance.
translation.ja: そのために ユニークな物語を用意した

translation.en: Something with magic and suspense.
translation.ja: この魅力的(みりょくてき)で スリルある物語は

translation.en: For this is a story of two magical creatures who fall in love.
translation.ja: 不思議な生き物たちの ラブストーリーだ

translation.en: A mermaid…
translation.ja: マーメイド役は⸺

translation.en: -Zuzu. -[gasps] Yes!
translation.ja: ズズ

translation.en: -Yes! -And a seahorse, Eric.
translation.ja: やった タツノオトシゴ役はエリック

translation.en: It is called Wedding Beneath the Sea.
translation.ja: タイトルは “海の世界の結婚(けっこん)式”

translation.en: -Eric? -There's not any kissy stuff, is there?
translation.ja: 何だ キスシーンはないよね？

translation.en: [in French accent] No. No, no, no, no.
translation.ja: あるわけない

translation.en: Well, oui, oui.
translation.ja: いや…　あるな

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no.
translation.ja: やっぱりない

translation.en: Your… Your… Your emotions are expressed through the artistry of dance.
translation.ja: その時の気持ちは ダンスで伝えるんだ

translation.en: -Say it with me. When I dance… -My body and soul soars?
translation.ja: いいかい　おどると… 心身が高まる

translation.en: My body and soul soars. Yes, Zuzu. Merci.
translation.ja: そのとおり　ありがとう

translation.en: Emma, you are a tropical fish who marries them. -Oh, yes. -Oh my!
translation.ja: エマは式を行う熱帯魚役だ

translation.en: The rest of you are wedding guests. You bring presents. You dance. -You tra-la-la. -[kids giggle]
translation.ja: 君たちはゲストとして 結婚(けっこん)式を もり上げる

translation.en: Monsieur Joie?
translation.ja: ジョワ先生？

translation.en: What do Bean and I do?
translation.ja: ビーンと私(わたし)は？

translation.en: [groans] Yes, you two.
translation.ja: わすれてた

translation.en: You'll be delighted to know I have taken on the choreographic challenge.
translation.ja: 君たちに ピッタリの役を考えた

translation.en: I have taken your erratic…
translation.ja: 君たちの その風変わりな…

translation.en: What would you even call… Movements. And transmuted them into art.
translation.ja: 何と言えば… 動きをうまく生かそう

translation.en: -You will be friendly squid. -[kids giggling]
translation.ja: 仲良しのイカ役だ

translation.en: Standing guard
translation.ja: ステージの中心より もっともっと後ろ側で

translation.en: at the very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very, very edge of the stage.
translation.ja: ステージの中心より もっともっと後ろ側で 見張(みは)り役をたのむ

translation.en: Like so, your tentacles waving on the passing tide,
translation.ja: 長い手足を波のように うねらせながら⸺

translation.en: ensuring the success of the wedding.
translation.ja: 結婚(けっこん)式の成功を見守る

translation.en: -Friendly squid? -They're just happy to be there.
translation.ja: イカ役？ イカは式を見られるだけで 幸せなんだ

translation.en: The invitation strictly said no babies and no squid.
translation.ja: イカは式を見られるだけで 幸せなんだ

translation.en: Oh! Best of all, this year's performance takes place at…
translation.ja: それと おどろくことに 大会の会場は⸺

translation.en: -The Burroughs Theater. -[kids gasp]
translation.ja: バローズ劇場(げきじょう)

translation.en: Which seats 300 people.
translation.ja: 観客数は なんと300人だ！

translation.en: It's not that I want to be like everyone else. It's just… Earrings are fun, Mom.
translation.ja: みんなと同じに なりたいわけじゃないわ

translation.en: -They feel like me. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: ピアスが好きなの

translation.en: I said the same thing to your grandma when I was your age. I wanted to dye my hair green.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)も昔 緑のかみにしたくて 何度もせがんだ

translation.en: Green?
translation.ja: 緑？

translation.en: [softly] Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Did she let you?
translation.ja: 緑にしたの？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: してない

translation.en: No, she did not.
translation.ja: ダメだと言われた

translation.en: -[Bean sighs] -[Charlotte] Ivy? Bean? What's the matter?
translation.ja: 二人とも どうしたの？

translation.en: [sighs] Nothing.
translation.ja: 別に

translation.en: Oh, honey. You sure? You look like you actually hurt your knee bone this time.
translation.ja: 今回は本当に ケガをしたみたいに見える

translation.en: -[Monsieur Joie] Bonjour, Madame. -[gasps]
translation.ja: ボンジュール！

translation.en: -Can we just go, please? -Bonjour, Madame.
translation.ja: 行こう 〈ごきげんよう〉

translation.en: Nancy.
translation.ja: ナンシー

translation.en: [chuckles] Hi, Harold.
translation.ja: ハロルド

translation.en: It's "Monsieur Joie."
translation.ja: ムシュー･ジョワだ

translation.en: -Monsieur Joie. -Ah.
translation.ja: ムシュー･ジョワ

translation.en: -How are these two doing? -We… Oh, yes… They're…. They're, um…
translation.ja: 二人はどう？ この二人？　えっと…

translation.en: I've never had budding little dancers who are… who are quite so…
translation.ja: 始めたばかりなのに 何と言うか…

translation.en: You know, I don't think that there's a word for it in French.
translation.ja: フランス語では言い表せない

translation.en: -[chuckles] -And they forgot their announcements. -The big recital. -[Ivy sighs]
translation.ja: ダンス大会のお知らせを わすれてるよ

translation.en: -Au revoir! -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 〈さようなら〉

translation.en: Bye, Harold.
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: A recital will be great. I bet you have fun parts.
translation.ja: 楽しそうね いい役なんでしょ？

translation.en: Yeah. Fun parts as the stars of the show, right?
translation.ja: いい役って もちろん主役よね？

translation.en: That's right, Nancy.
translation.ja: すべてのシーンに出るわ

translation.en: -We're in every scene. -Really?
translation.ja: すべてのシーンに出るわ 今年は新しい顔ぶれね

translation.en: [Charlotte] You got some new dancers this year.
translation.ja: 今年は新しい顔ぶれね

translation.en: You're the two friendly squid?
translation.ja: “２匹(ひき)の仲良しのイカ”？

translation.en: That is so embarrassing.
translation.ja: はずかしい役ね

translation.en: Nancy, could you be nice to your sister, just once?
translation.ja: ナンシー 妹にやさしくできない？

translation.en: I am nice.
translation.ja: してるもん

translation.en: I cannot wait to see Bean as the friendly squid.
translation.ja: 仲良しのイカになった ビーンを見るのが楽しみ

translation.en: No one's gonna laugh, Bean. Everybody is going to be very proud.
translation.ja: だれも笑ったりしない ほめてくれるわ

translation.en: -[soft chuckle] -Buckle up.
translation.ja: 出発よ

translation.en: Eric, honey, you were supposed to paint the fish, not yourself.
translation.ja: 自分じゃなくて 魚に色をぬるの

translation.en: [Eric] Sorry.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Okay. Ten more minutes, class, then we'll hang your fish prints on the wall.
translation.ja: あと10分で完成させてね

translation.en: Please get these permission slips signed by your parents as soon as possible, otherwise you won't be able to go on the field trip.
translation.ja: 校外学習があるから おうちでサインをもらってね

translation.en: -[giggling] -What's so funny?
translation.ja: 何がおかしいの？

translation.en: Nothing, just your fish printing. [chuckles]
translation.ja: あなたの魚を見てただけ

translation.en: Zuzu said you guys are gonna be like this fish at your recital.
translation.ja: 君たちはダンス大会で 魚になるらしいね

translation.en: A flop.
translation.ja: こけちゃった

translation.en: Why do you care? You're not even coming.
translation.ja: 来ないなら ほっといて

translation.en: I'm coming with my sister.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)は妹と行くよ

translation.en: We both love ballet.
translation.ja: バレエが大好きなの

translation.en: Who else is going to the dance festival?
translation.ja: 他に大会に行く人は？

translation.en: I am, Paisley.
translation.ja: 行くよ

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] Dance festival?
translation.ja: 大会があるの？

translation.en: [kid 1] I didn't know you can dance, Ivy.
translation.ja: アイビーもおどるんだね

translation.en: No way.
translation.ja: もう最悪

translation.en: Don't worry. They're coming to watch dancing. Not wiggling.
translation.ja: みんなはダンスを 見に来るのよ

translation.en: And definitely not wiggling, friendly squid. [chuckles]
translation.ja: クネクネするイカじゃないわ

translation.en: I might be there for the wiggling, friendly squid.
translation.ja: ボクはイカが見たいかもな

translation.en: What exactly is a squid? It has ink, right?
translation.ja: イカって確(たし)か⸺ 手足が多くて スミをはく

translation.en: -And weird tentacle arms. -[kids laugh]
translation.ja: 手足が多くて スミをはく

translation.en: [kid 2] Leo.
translation.ja: リオ！

translation.en: Okay, class, who wants the horseshoe crab? -[kid 3] I do! I do! It's an arthropod, a living fossil.
translation.ja: 生きる化石とも言われる カブトガニがほしい人？

translation.en: -Yeah? -[Emma] Thanks, Ms. Aruba-Tate.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: And then there's this little invertebrate. A squid!
translation.ja: この背骨(せぼね)を持たないイカは？

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] All yours, Dusit.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: [in silly voice] I'm doing ballet. I'm so silly.
translation.ja: “私(わたし)はバレエをしてるの”

translation.en: I'm Ivy and Bean.
translation.ja: “アイビーとビーンよ”

translation.en: [Ivy sighs] That was just the beginning, Bean. The whole school will be laughing at us.
translation.ja: まだマシよ 学校中で笑い者にされる

translation.en: Nancy, too. She'll see we're not the stars of the show, and she'll get $20.
translation.ja: ナンシーにも笑われて 20ドルをはらうハメになる

translation.en: I'll have to do chores forever to pay that.
translation.ja: はらうために お手伝いしないと

translation.en: There has to be some way out of this. Nothing's impossible.
translation.ja: 何か方法があるはずよ 不可能(ふかのう)はないわ

translation.en: Being good at ballet is impossible.
translation.ja: うまく おどるのはムリ

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: But it wouldn't be impossible to break our legs.
translation.ja: でも足の骨(ほね)なら折れるかも

translation.en: [Bean] Ivy, we shouldn't do this.
translation.ja: アイビー やめよう

translation.en: [sighs] You know, when Eric broke his arm, the first time,
translation.ja: エリックが初めて うでの骨(ほね)を折った時

translation.en: you could almost see his bone sticking out.
translation.ja: 骨(ほね)がつき出してるのが見えた

translation.en: -Maybe breaking is a very bad idea. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: 足の骨(ほね)を折るのはやめよう

translation.en: How about
translation.ja: じゃあ 代わりに⸺

translation.en: spraining?
translation.ja: くじく？

translation.en: Au revoir, recital!
translation.ja: またね ダンス大会

translation.en: Toodle-oo tentacles!
translation.ja: バイバイ イカの手足

translation.en: [both] This is a bad idea!
translation.ja: やらなきゃよかった

translation.en: Probably just a bruise would work.
translation.ja: アザがあれば十分かもね

translation.en: -Huh? -We look like idiots.
translation.ja: バカみたい

translation.en: Squidiots.
translation.ja: バカイカだ

translation.en: -Oh. -There's not enough tentacles.
translation.ja: 手足の数もちがう

translation.en: There's supposed to be ten.
translation.ja: 全部で10本よ

translation.en: -Are you sure it's not eight? -Ten.
translation.ja: ８本だろ？ 10本よ

translation.en: They're ten-tacles.
translation.ja: ８本なのはタコだよ

translation.en: Oh. No complaining. Because you girls…
translation.ja: だいじょうぶ　二人とも⸺

translation.en: look great.
translation.ja: よく似合(にあ)ってる

translation.en: -[David] What do you think? -Very squid-like.
translation.ja: どう？ イカっぽい

translation.en: -Mmm-hmm. -[David] Right?
translation.ja: だろ？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -So cute.
translation.ja: すごくかわいい

translation.en: Don't lie, Mom. You're laughing.
translation.ja: 笑ってるじゃん

translation.en: -No. [laughs] -No. -I choked on a cracker. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: クラッカーをつまらせたの

translation.en: [Katrine] You know what would make this? If we did something around the neck with like a scarf?
translation.ja: 首にスカーフを巻(ま)くのは どうかしら？

translation.en: -Or, um, what about a bow tie? -Bow tie, yes.
translation.ja: ちょうネクタイとか 名案だ

translation.en: The problem is there's not enough tentacles.
translation.ja: 手足が足りないの

translation.en: -And more tentacles, definitely. -[Katrine] Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: もっと つけましょう

translation.en: -[Charlotte] And some suction cups. -[Katrine] Yes.
translation.ja: 吸盤(きゅうばん)も

translation.en: You can't be serious.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ？

translation.en: There's not enough tentacles.
translation.ja: 数が足りないの

translation.en: The number of tentacles is definitely the problem.
translation.ja: 足りてないのは大問題ね

translation.en: Nancy.
translation.ja: ナンシー

translation.en: [Nancy] I can't wait to see this.
translation.ja: 本番が楽しみだわ

translation.en: Stars of the show.
translation.ja: 主役だもんね

translation.en: [David] She's just jealous. -You girls are gonna be great. -[Bean] Hmm.
translation.ja: うらやましいんだよ 応援(おうえん)してるぞ

translation.en: There's got to be some way not to do this besides breaking bones.
translation.ja: 骨折(こっせつ)じゃない方法が あるはず

translation.en: Are you sure you haven't figured out that invisibility spell?
translation.ja: 姿(すがた)を消す魔法(まほう)は使えないの？

translation.en: I don't think any spell can help us now.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)じゃムリだよ

translation.en: Maybe we can just hide ourselves up in the tree house
translation.ja: ツリーハウスの中に かくれるのは？

translation.en: with ten years of supplies?
translation.ja: 食べ物を持ってね

translation.en: They'd probably just cut it down and make us go.
translation.ja: 木を切って連れていかれるよ

translation.en: Mmm, maybe we should just run away?
translation.ja: にげるのは？

translation.en: I love running away. Where should we go?
translation.ja: いいね　どこに行く？

translation.en: What about the park?
translation.ja: 公園は？

translation.en: -There's a policeman with a dog. -[door opens] -He smells you. -[David] Bye, Katrine.
translation.ja: 警察(けいさつ)犬がいるから見つかるよ

translation.en: -[Katrine] Thanks for the costumes. -[David] You're welcome.
translation.ja: ありがとう いいんだ

translation.en: -[Charlotte] See you tomorrow. -[Katrine] Dinner in a half-hour, Ivy.
translation.ja: また明日 すぐ夕飯よ

translation.en: I signed your permission slip for the aquarium. Don't forget to put it in your bag.
translation.ja: 校外学習の同意書に サインしたわよ

translation.en: [gasps] I can't believe we didn't see this.
translation.ja: “６月21日” 見落としてた

translation.en: Read!
translation.ja: 読んで

translation.en: "Permission to go to the aquarium."
translation.ja: “水族館に行く同意書”

translation.en: It's the same day as the recital. We can run away and hide at the aquarium.
translation.ja: 大会と同じ日だから 水族館にかくれよう

translation.en: By the time they find us, the dance festival will be over.
translation.ja: 見つかる頃(ころ)には 大会も終わってるよ

translation.en: [both] Yes!
translation.ja: よし！

translation.en: Watch for cars.
translation.ja: 車に気をつけて

translation.en: Be careful. Cross the street. Come on.
translation.ja: さあ 道をわたるわよ

translation.en: Our new home.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちの新しい家だ

translation.en: The minute no one's watching, we'll find a place to hide.
translation.ja: こっそり かくれよう

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, come on, keep up.
translation.ja: アイビーとビーン　急いで

translation.en: [Ivy and Bean] Coming!
translation.ja: はい！

translation.en: I don't want to lose you.
translation.ja: 迷子(まいご)になるわよ

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to the aquarium.
translation.ja: 水族館へようこそ

translation.en: Today, the Marine Mammal Rescue Team will be feeding the dolphins at 2 p.m…
translation.ja: 本日は午後２時より イルカショーを開催(かいさい)します

translation.en: What's in your backpacks?
translation.ja: リュックには何を？

translation.en: None of your beeswax.
translation.ja: 関係ないでしょ

translation.en: I brought fish chum for the sharks. I wanna see a feeding frenzy.
translation.ja: エサをむさぼるサメが 見たくて⸺

translation.en: -[Emma gasps] -[Dusit] It's gonna be carnage.
translation.ja: エサを持ってきた

translation.en: Could I throw some? -I'd love to see a feeding frenzy. -Ugh!
translation.ja: エサをくれない？ 私(わたし)も見たい

translation.en: -[Emma] And I love sharks. -[Bean] How about down there?
translation.ja: サメが好きなの あそこは？

translation.en: Okay, listen up everyone. Come here, please. Come on.
translation.ja: みんな 聞いて さあ こっちに集まって

translation.en: -Come here. -[Eric] Whoa! This place is great.
translation.ja: さあ こっちに集まって すごい

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, come up with the rest of us, please.
translation.ja: アイビーとビーンも来なさい

translation.en: We're gonna stay on the first floor today, all right?
translation.ja: 見学するのは１階だけよ

translation.en: Find your field trip buddy.
translation.ja: じゃあ ２人組になって

translation.en: Eric, Paisley couldn't make it. So, you and Vanessa should buddy up today.
translation.ja: エリック ヴァネッサと 組んでくれる？

translation.en: -[Eric] Yes, miss. -Let's go!
translation.ja: 出発！

translation.en: [kids] Yes, Ms. Aruba-Tate!
translation.ja: はい 先生

translation.en: Are there any sharks here?
translation.ja: サメはいますか？

translation.en: Even just one great white? Or any other color will do.
translation.ja: ホホジロザメとか 何でもいいんです

translation.en: Dusit, we're gonna hand this over to our expert guide. -And we'll get questions after, okay? -[class] Whoa!
translation.ja: プロに案内してもらうから 質問(しつもん)は そのあとね

translation.en: The sea lions, who call this tank home, are faster than any other type of seal.
translation.ja: アシカ科の中でも このアシカは泳ぎが速い

translation.en: -[kid 2] Wow, look at that! -[kid 3] Whoa!
translation.ja: 見て！

translation.en: They can move at 25 miles per hour, which helps them feed on sardines.
translation.ja: 時速40キロで泳ぎ イワシをつかまえて食べる

translation.en: -[kid 4] Oh, they're beautiful! -But they also love to play not with….
translation.ja: こっちに来る アシカとサメは⸺

translation.en: sharks so much, but they are very good surfers.
translation.ja: 仲が悪いけど サーフィンは得意(とくい)だ

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] Eric, don't touch the glass, please.
translation.ja: エリック ガラスにさわらないで

translation.en: -We don't want any accidents. -Bean. We gotta go.
translation.ja: エリック ガラスにさわらないで ビーン 早く行かないと

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] Dusit, put away the fish chum, please.
translation.ja: サメのエサは しまって

translation.en: Whoa. That could be where we hide out.
translation.ja: こっちへ

translation.en: This is perfect.
translation.ja: 最高のかくれ場所ね

translation.en: [Bean] It's so private. I call this one!
translation.ja: 最高のかくれ場所ね これを私(わたし)のイスにする

translation.en: [Ivy] This one's mine.
translation.ja: これを私(わたし)のイスにする

translation.en: What just happened?
translation.ja: 暗くなった？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: Try and find a light.
translation.ja: 電気のスイッチを探(さが)すよ

translation.en: Okay. There's gotta be one somewhere.
translation.ja: どこかにあるはず

translation.en: Hmm. Nothing.
translation.ja: ない

translation.en: [gasps] I found something!
translation.ja: 何かあるよ

translation.en: [Bean] Whoa, Nelly!
translation.ja: すごい！

translation.en: [aquarium narrator] The ocean is full of many mysteries…
translation.ja: 海は多くのナゾに 満ちていますが

translation.en: -Whoa. -…but none quite as mysterious as the creatures of the deep.
translation.ja: 深海生物ほど 神秘的(しんぴてき)なものはいません

translation.en: [Bean] Ivy?
translation.ja: アイビー

translation.en: I get it. This shows what life is like at the bottom of the sea.
translation.ja: 海底に住む生き物の様子が 見られるのよ

translation.en: Oh, look.
translation.ja: 見て

translation.en: [aquarium narrator] Prepare to be amazed.
translation.ja: 心の準備(じゅんび)はいい？

translation.en: What the heck is that?
translation.ja: あの生き物は一体 何なの？

translation.en: [aquarium narrator] The extraordinary anglerfish has a luminous spine
translation.ja: 鋭(するど)い歯を持つアンコウは 光るちょうちんで

translation.en: that lures victims into its sharp teeth.
translation.ja: 獲物(えもの)をおびきよせます

translation.en: I think I'd rather do the recital.
translation.ja: 大会に行く方がいい

translation.en: -Me too! -[both whimper]
translation.ja: 私(わたし)も

translation.en: [aquarium narrator] In these black waters lurks the dragon of the deep,
translation.ja: 深海には おそろしい生物が ひそんでいます

translation.en: the giant squid.
translation.ja: ダイオウイカです

translation.en: -[Bean gasps] -[aquarium narrator] It watches and waits… ready to strike.
translation.ja: 息をひそめて 獲物(えもの)にねらいを定めます

translation.en: Are you brave enough to face its tentacles?
translation.ja: この長い手足と 戦う勇気がありますか？

translation.en: There they are. Thank you.
translation.ja: いたわ　ありがとう

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, where were you? I was so worried.
translation.ja: 二人とも どこにいたの？ 心配したのよ

translation.en: -We got scared. -We got really scared.
translation.ja: こわかった すごく こわかった

translation.en: Oh, no. Because you were lost?
translation.ja: 迷子(まいご)になったから？

translation.en: Ye-yes. Lo-lost.
translation.ja: はい そうです

translation.en: You poor things. I'm so sorry. -It's okay. You're safe now. -Hmm.
translation.ja: かわいそうに でも もう安心よ

translation.en: I told you they weren't dead.
translation.ja: ほら生きてた

translation.en: I didn't say dead. I said, "Probably eaten by a sea lion."
translation.ja: アシカに食べられたかもと 言っただけよ

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] It's okay. You're here and safe.
translation.ja: もう だいじょうぶ

translation.en: -[Ivy and Bean] Thanks, Ms. Aruba-Tate. -[sighs]
translation.ja: 先生 ありがとう

translation.en: We got to see the eels, and you didn't. They're freaky scary.
translation.ja: ウナギを見たんだ すごく こわかったよ

translation.en: Not as intimidating as a giant squid.
translation.ja: ダイオウイカの方がこわい

translation.en: It had this freaky big eye that hypnotized us.
translation.ja: 目を見たら動けなくなった

translation.en: Bean, a squid can't hypnotize people.
translation.ja: そんなの ありえない

translation.en: [Leo] There is not a giant squid in here.
translation.ja: ダイオウイカなんていない

translation.en: Nobody has a giant squid.
translation.ja: だれも見てないもん

translation.en: Giant squid? How did you guys get to the Creatures of the Deep room?
translation.ja: ダイオウイカがいる 深海生物エリアは

translation.en: That's on a totally different floor.
translation.ja: 別の階よね？

translation.en: -Ivy? -Uh…
translation.ja: アイビー

translation.en: Did you get lost on purpose?
translation.ja: わざと迷子(まいご)に？

translation.en: Um… Well… So, I thought--
translation.ja: えっと その…

translation.en: It was kind of my fault, Ms. Aruba-Tate. Don't blame Ivy.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)のせいだから アイビーを責(せ)めないで

translation.en: We started off a little lost, and then I said, "Let's go this way."
translation.ja: みんなと はぐれちゃって⸺ 私(わたし)が“こっちに行こう”と

translation.en: But it was the wrong way.
translation.ja: でも もどれなかった

translation.en: So, I said, "Here are some stairs that we can go down together."
translation.ja: 前には階段があったから いっしょに下の階に行こうと さそったんです

translation.en: Thank you again for everything.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: You're welcome. Bye.
translation.ja: どういたしまして

translation.en: [Ms. Aruba-Tate] We're gonna be leaving in a minute. Yes!
translation.ja: みんな すぐに出発よ

translation.en: Ivy, Bean,
translation.ja: アイビー　ビーン

translation.en: if I can't trust you two to behave safely and responsibly,
translation.ja: 自分勝手な行動をするなら

translation.en: you realize I won't be able to take you on any future field trips.
translation.ja: 校外学習には連れていけない

translation.en: I'm sorry, Ms. Aruba-Tate.
translation.ja: ごめんなさい 先生

translation.en: I am too. Really sorry. Really.
translation.ja: 本当に ごめんなさい

translation.en: I know you can help each other do better when it comes to things like this.
translation.ja: 二人の力をプラスに向けるの

translation.en: I also know you can help each other do great things.
translation.ja: すごいことが できるわ

translation.en: Eric told me that you're all performing in a dance recital tonight.
translation.ja: 今日の夜 ダンス大会に出るそうね

translation.en: I'm really looking forward to it.
translation.ja: 楽しみにしてる

translation.en: [driver] All right, kids. Please take your seats.
translation.ja: みんな座(すわ)って　出発だ

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome, one and all, to tonight's Dance Delirium.
translation.ja: ご来場のみなさま ダンス大会へようこそ

translation.en: -A Festival of Movement in 26 Acts. -[laughing]
translation.ja: 本日は26組が パフォーマンス予定です

translation.en: -You will be delighted, amazed, and… -Twenty-six acts?
translation.ja: 本日は26組が パフォーマンス予定です 26組だって？

translation.en: I hate how they design these recitals to go on forever.
translation.ja: 多すぎて うんざりするよ

translation.en: Oh, I… I mean, not yours, honey. You were great.
translation.ja: もちろん お前のダンスは別だ

translation.en: No, no, it's fine. This is gonna be great.
translation.ja: いいの　楽しみだわ

translation.en: Great for me. Twenty dollars is mine.
translation.ja: 20ドルが手に入るもの

translation.en: There's no way these squidiots are gonna be stars of the show.
translation.ja: バカイカが 主役になれるはずない

translation.en: [festival announcer] Please take your seats.
translation.ja: ご着席ください

translation.en: Act 14 will start in one minute.
translation.ja: まもなく第14部が始まります

translation.en: [whispering] Five.
Ten.
Fifteen.
Twenty.
[Monsieur Joie] Securing rope. Almost ready.
translation.ja: ロープも固定したし

translation.en: Standing by.
translation.ja: これで準備(じゅんび)ができたぞ

translation.en: Standing by. Raise.
translation.ja: これで準備(じゅんび)ができたぞ 上げて

translation.en: Put some muscle into it, Maman. We don't have all day.
translation.ja: 力いっぱい引っ張(ぱ)ってくれ

translation.en: Whale ascending! Whale ascending.
translation.ja: クジラが上がっていくぞ

translation.en: You guys like my fins? Like a real fish.
translation.ja: このヒレ 本物みたいでしょ？

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Put your back into it, Maman.
translation.ja: がんばって

translation.en: -[creaks, loud clatter] -Oh! Maman!
translation.ja: ママン

translation.en: You guys do look,
translation.ja: 二人ともすごく…

translation.en: uh, friendly,
translation.ja: 仲が良さそう

translation.en: which is good because in the program it does say that you are friendly squids.
translation.ja: 仲良しのイカ役だから ピッタリだね

translation.en: I don't think Monsieur Joie has seen a real squid.
translation.ja: イカはだれとも仲良くしない

translation.en: A real giant squid is not friendly at all.
translation.ja: ダイオウイカはこわいもん

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Who has the glitter? The glitter is très important!
translation.ja: 紙ふぶきは どこにある？

translation.en: Where are my stars? Where are my stars?
translation.ja: 主役の二人はどこに行った？

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.ja: どこにいる？

translation.en: -Je suis ici, monsieur. -Oh!
translation.ja: ここです

translation.en: -[Monsieur Joie] Then, now I can focus. -Oh, no. You really can't dance with those tentacles.
translation.ja: おどるには その手足はジャマよ

translation.en: Which, when you think about it is, well, probably a good thing.
translation.ja: でも あなたたちには ピッタリの衣装(いしょう)かもね

translation.en: -[Monsieur Joie] You are the fish. -Hmm.
translation.ja: 君が魚だな

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] Feel the water. See the coral.
translation.ja: 水を感じてサンゴを見ろ

translation.en: Oh. Mademoiselles Bean and Ivy.
translation.ja: ビーンとアイビー どこから見ても…

translation.en: Well, you certainly are, um… well-tentacled.
translation.ja: ビーンとアイビー どこから見ても… 立派(りっぱ)なイカだ

translation.en: Uh, just please don't knock down the set.
translation.ja: セットをたおすなよ

translation.en: [shrieks] Mon Dieu!
translation.ja: 大変だ

translation.en: Places! Places! 14th act! That's us!
translation.ja: 位置につけ　本番が始まる

translation.en: -Tout de suite! That means get on stage! -[kid] Go, go. [Monsieur Joie] Get on stage!
translation.ja: さあ 急いで ステージに上がるんだ

translation.en: [announcer] Please take your seats. Act 14 is about to commence.
translation.ja: 第14部が始まります

translation.en: Amanda, look! [chuckles]
translation.ja: 始まるよ

translation.en: So talented.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Wow!
translation.ja: おどろいた

translation.en: -Is that really Bean and Ivy? -So goofy.
translation.ja: ビーンとアイビー？ ダサい

translation.en: [Bean] What do I do?
translation.ja: こうだよ

translation.en: [Ivy] Put your arms up.
translation.ja: 両手を上げて

translation.en: -[Bean] Look, Ivy, over here! Quickly! -[Ivy] Ah!
translation.ja: アイビー こっちだよ

translation.en: [Bean] Spin, spin, spin!
translation.ja: 回らないと

translation.en: Twenty dollars.
translation.ja: 20ドル

translation.en: -Wait. Are we supposed to be in the back? -Oh.
translation.ja: 早く後ろへ

translation.en: You're right, Ivy. A real squid is the opposite of friendly.
translation.ja: 本物のイカは だれとも仲良くしない

translation.en: A real squid would never just stand around wiggling.
translation.ja: 立ってるだけでもない

translation.en: A real squid just lurks in the shadows
translation.ja: イカは かげにひそんで

translation.en: until it's time to attack, like the Wilis in Giselle.
translation.ja: ジゼルのように 戦う時を待つの

translation.en: A real squid doesn't care about a stupid bet with a stupid big sister.
translation.ja: バカな賭(か)けだって気にしない

translation.en: A real squid doesn't care if people laugh at them. A real squid doesn't care about anything.
translation.ja: だれかに笑われても 何をされても動じない

translation.en: It rules the seas.
translation.ja: 海の王だもん

translation.en: -We're standing by with the glitter. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: ひもを引けば紙ふぶきが舞(ま)う

translation.en: -And go. -[breathes deeply]
translation.ja: ひもを引けば紙ふぶきが舞(ま)う 今だ

translation.en: Go. Go, go, go. Faster. Come on, faster.
translation.ja: 早く引いて もういい　どけ

translation.en: -[kids screaming] -[Ivy] Zuzu!
translation.ja: ズズ

translation.en: Come on, friendly squid. Help a whale out!
translation.ja: おい 仲良しのイカ 助けてくれ

translation.en: [in French accent] No, no, no, no, no.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: -[audience applauding] -[Bean] Squids coming through.
translation.ja: イカが通るよ

translation.en: When I dance, my body and soul soars! [chuckles]
translation.ja: “おどると 心身ともに 高みにのぼれる”

translation.en: [Monsieur Joie] The show must go on.
translation.ja: ショーは続く！

translation.en: [Ivy] We're out! We're done! And we never have to go back on stage!
translation.ja: もうステージに 立たなくていいんだ

translation.en: Or stand around in first position. We can do what squid do.
translation.ja: これで やっと イカらしいことができる

translation.en: Giant squid versus whale!
translation.ja: イカとクジラの戦いだ

translation.en: [audience chanting] Squid! Squid! Squid! -Huh? -[audience] Squid! Squid! [clapping rhythmically] Squid! Squid!
translation.ja: イカ！　イカ！

translation.en: Do they mean us?
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちのこと？

translation.en: -Squid! Squid! Squid! -Go, Squid!
translation.ja: いけ！

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Squid! Squid! Squid!
translation.ja: イカ！

translation.en: -[chuckling] -Squid forever!
translation.ja: イカは永遠(えいえん)だ

translation.en: -Brava! -Brava!
translation.ja: ブラボー ブラボー！

translation.en: Encore! Encore!
translation.ja: アンコール！

translation.en: You were right not to let them quit.
translation.ja: 続けさせてよかった

translation.en: Yes, but let's agree that they're quitting after this.
translation.ja: でも やめさせましょう

translation.en: Oh, thank God.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: -[Bean] Yeah. -Three hundred people cheering for us? I still can't believe it.
translation.ja: 300人の歓声(かんせい)を浴びたなんて 信じられない

translation.en: We were the stars, Ivy.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちが主役だった

translation.en: [Nancy] Bean,
translation.ja: ビーン

translation.en: all I can say to you two is…
translation.ja: 私(わたし)から二人に言えることは…

translation.en: You earned this.
translation.ja: あんたのよ

translation.en: And you earned this.
translation.ja: あなたには これを

translation.en: -Mom, I can get my ears pierced? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: ピアス？

translation.en: Why'd you change your mind?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: You convinced me a while ago, honey. I was just waiting for the perfect moment.
translation.ja: わたすチャンスを うかがってたの

translation.en: Twenty dollars, Ivy. Twenty! We're rich!
translation.ja: 20ドルだよ 私(わたし)たちはお金持ちだ

translation.en: It's your money, Bean.
translation.ja: ビーンのよ

translation.en: It's our money. You heard my sister, we earned it.
translation.ja: ナンシーが“二人に”って

translation.en: So, what should we spend it on?
translation.ja: このお金で何したい？

translation.en: There's so many things we can do together.
translation.ja: できることは たくさんある

translation.en: I've got some pretty good ideas. Don't you?
translation.ja: いい案を 思いついてるでしょ？

translation.en: Ivy, Bean, come.
translation.ja: アイビー　ビーン あなたたちはヒーローよ

translation.en: -You saved the day. Come on! -[kids chuckle]
translation.ja: あなたたちはヒーローよ

translation.en: -[ballet student] Squid versus squid! -[ballet students] Go squid!
translation.ja: イカの戦いだ がんばれ イカ！ すごいよ

translation.en: [Zuzu] Squids are the best!
translation.ja: イカは最高だ！

translation.en: [Travis] What are you doing, Bean?
translation.ja: ビーン それは何？

translation.en: I'm making the Pit of Doom.
translation.ja: “死の落とし穴(あな)”よ

translation.en: Wanna help? It'll be fun.
translation.ja: やる？　楽しいよ

translation.en: The only thing that's gonna fall in this pit is you.
translation.ja: この穴(あな)に落ちるのは 君だけだよ

translation.en: -Why don't you ask the new girl? -[Bean] Ivy? All she does is read.
translation.ja: 向かいの子は？ アイビー？ ずっと読書してる

translation.en: -She reads at recess. -What's wrong with Bean?
translation.ja: ずっと読書してる なぜ？

translation.en: She just runs around and makes noise.
translation.ja: 走り回って さわいでるだけだもん

translation.en: Just wanna wash your uniform for you! [grunts]
translation.ja: 服を洗(あら)ってあげる

translation.en: You know the rules. Three strikes, you're out.
translation.ja: あんたはルールを３つ破(やぶ)った

translation.en: I'm running away.
translation.ja: 家出する

translation.en: [whispering] Psst. Follow me.
translation.ja: こっちよ

translation.en: [Ivy] I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.ja: 相手をおどらせる魔法(まほう)を 学んだ

translation.en: Mom wants you home now!
translation.ja: 早く帰ってきなさい！

translation.en: [Bean] Let's sneak through the backyards to creep up on Nancy and do the spell.
translation.ja: こっそりナンシーに近づいて 魔法(まほう)をかけよう

translation.en: I hope you're ready to dance forever!
translation.ja: 一生 おどり続けてもらう

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: イヤだ

translation.en: Large squid. ♪ Mama, please let me do what I do I got to have it, yeah ♪
translation.ja: 美しく見せるために 練習してる

translation.en: Maman.
translation.ja: ママン！

translation.en: Au revoir!
translation.ja: 〈さようなら〉

translation.en: ♪ Dance! ♪
translation.ja: イカの手足

translation.en: Battement! Battement! Marching.
translation.ja: バットマンからの行進

translation.en: -[director] Cut! -[laughing]
translation.ja: カット！
